definition[0]: when musicians tune up, they prepare their instruments to play at the right pitch
example[0]: The band were tuning up their guitars.
definition[1]: to make small changes to an engine so that it works as well as possible
definition[2]: the process of making small changes to an engine so that it works as well as possible
definition[3]: an occasion that someone uses as preparation for a more important occasion
example[1]: He is treating the semi-finals as a tune-up.
